snippet: The Italian cabinet on Tuesday dismissed the entire local government of the southern city of Reggio Calabria to prevent Mafia infiltration.
abstract: Italian cabinet dismisses entire local government of the southern city of Reggio Calabria to prevent infiltration by the Mafia; several City Council members were found to have ties to organized crime.
lead_paragraph: The Italian cabinet on Tuesday dismissed the entire local government of the southern city of Reggio Calabria to prevent Mafia infiltration.

headline.seo: City Government in Italy Is Dissolved Over Possible Mafia Ties
headline.main: Italy: City Government Is Dissolved Over Possible Mafia Ties
headline.print_headline: Italy: City Government Is Dissolved Over Allegations of Ties to Mafia
